pr_title: Fix | Add certificate expire validation when using Always Encrypted with secure enclaves

timeline.message: Merge branch 'dev' of https://github.com/microsoft/mssql-jdbc into CertExpiry

timeline.author: lilgreenbird

replies.bodyText: I don't think it's necessary, up to the user to make sure their certificates haven't expired.
replies.author: rene-ye

replies.bodyText: I think would be helpful if someone complains that they do have the certificate why isn't it working. But, I don't feel strongly about it so ok.
replies.author: lilgreenbird
